rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language ('Analysing the genetic data... will be necessary') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports planned analysis but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a necessary future action ('Analysing the genetic data... will be necessary') for understanding (capability/research) without active reassurance.
